text.description:
{Axe of Smashing}

When worn by a commander this artifact gives +5 Attack plus +1 Attack after every 6 victorious battles.
text.event: You pick up the heavy Axe of Smashing. You're sure your Commander would love to smash a few heads with it!
text.name: Axe of Smashing

text.description:
{Mithril Mail}

When worn by a commander this artifact gives +12% Health plus +1% Health after every victorious battle.
text.event: You pick up the gleaming suit of Mithril Mail. This armor will surely extend your Commander's life when worn in battle!
text.name: Mithril Mail

text.description:
{Sword of Sharpness}

When worn by a commander this artifact gives +12% Damage plus +1% Damage after every victorious battle.
text.event: You pick up the glowing Sword of Sharpness. You're sure your Commander will enjoy chopping the enemy to pieces with it!
text.name: Sword of Sharpness

text.description:
{Helm of Immortality}

Revives a slain Commander immediately after battle (artifact incremental bonuses are not lost).

{Helm of Immortality}

When worn makes Commander almost invulnerable to physical attack.
text.event: You pick up the shining Helm of Immortality. If your Commander wears this, death will never last for long!
text.name: Helm of Immortality

text.description:
{Pendant of Sorcery}

When worn by a commander this artifact gives +1 Magic Power plus +1 Magic Power after every 10 victorious battles.
text.event: You pick up the ancient Pendant of Sorcery. With this magical pendant, your Commander's Magic Power will grow stronger!
text.name: Pendant of Sorcery

text.description:
{Boots Of Haste}

When worn by a commander this artifact gives +1 Speed plus +1 Speed after every 10 victorious battles.
text.event: You pick up the well-made Boots of Haste. These boots will surely lend wings to your Commander's feet on the battlefield!
text.name: Boots Of Haste

text.description:
{Bow of Seeking}

When worn by a commander this artifact gives Shooting Ability after 5 victorius balles, No Obstacle Penalty after 25 victorious battle and No Long-Range Penalty after 50 victorious battles.
text.event: You pick up the finely-crafted Bow of Seeking. If used by a Commander skilled in archery, long distances and walls will never be a hindrance again!
text.name: Bow of Seeking

text.description:
{Dragon Eye Ring}

When worn by a commander this artifact gives Commander Breath Attack (two squares) and Dragon nature (gets bonuses as Dragons).
text.event: You pick up the beautiful Dragon Eye Ring. On your Commander's finger, this ring will bestow the power of dragons!
text.name: Dragon Eye Ring

text.description:
{Hardened Shield}

When worn by a commander this artifact gives +5 Defense plus +1 Defense after every 6 victorious battles.
text.event: You pick up the Hardened Shield. With this excellent shield, your Commander's defenses will surely improve!
text.name: Hardened Shield

text.description:
{Slava's Ring Of Power}

When worn by a commander this artifact gives Commander all bonuses from Master level.

{Slava's Ring Of Power}

When worn by a commander this artifact gives Commander all six Primary Skills at Advanced level.
text.event: You pick up Slava's Ring of Power and can feel its strong magic. On your Commander's finger, this ring will bestow great power!
text.name: Slava's Ring Of Power
